post_message: The vile legislation that is now before the Senate might as well be called the "Donald Trump Act." Like the disgusting and outrageous language championed by Donald Trump, this legislation paints all immigrants as “criminals and rapists.” Local law enforcement officials, domestic violence groups, immigrants’ rights groups, mayors, faith leaders and labor groups all oppose the "Donald Trump Act." This bill does nothing to keep Americans safe, and it certainly does nothing to address our broken immigration system.
